name: Muse
headline: Build your website as an immersive virtual world. 3D website builder.
description: Muse allows anyone to transform their static website into a virtual world. We do this through our no-code editor,. Our websites are quickly replacing traditional personal websites commonly built using Shopify, Squarespace, or Wix.

founders.name: Benjamin Ha, Founder/CEO
founders.description:
I started coding because my parents didn't let me play video games and I had to learn how to build them myself. 

I grew up being inspired by a lot of web based games that were popular on websites such as addictinggames.com and aromorgames.com.

This is an era that has now passed. 

Now, I am working on Muse so we can reimagine websites as games to make the internet fun once again. 

YC Badge: 0x8B873805b19d60E16A53cD30992fEf01c007a746

raw_markdown='# Muse: Create a custom 3D World | No-code 3D World Builder, a 3D World built by Mort
## About
This is a 3D World built with Muse. You are likely seeing this text if you are a robot, are using a screen reader, or have an outdated browser. We hope this provides enough information and context to still navigate the 3D World.
## Content
#### Book a call to learn how to use Muse!

generated_description:
**Muse: Transforming Websites into Immersive 3D Experiences**

Founded in 2020 and a proud member of Y Combinator’s S21 batch, Muse is revolutionizing how we think about websites. Based in Sunnyvale, CA, this nimble team of two is on a mission to take your static website and reimagine it as a vibrant, immersive virtual world—without needing to code.

**The Concept**  
At its core, Muse operates through a no-code editor, empowering anyone, regardless of technical skill, to build a unique 3D web experience. This innovation is a direct challenge to traditional website builders like Shopify, Squarespace, and Wix, which often keep users tethered to standard templates and formats. Instead, Muse encourages creativity and exploration, letting users construct their sites as interactive spaces that engage visitors in new ways.

**Why Muse Matters**  
In a digital landscape where visual and interactive elements increasingly dictate user engagement, Muse offers a fresh alternative. The idea of your website as a virtual world not only captures attention but also invites deeper connection and interaction. Whether you're a creator, a business, or someone just wanting a personal space online, Muse's approach is tailored to expanding your possibilities.

**Looking Ahead**  
With the increasing relevance of virtual reality and online engagement, Muse stands at the forefront of a new wave in web development. Its focus on seamless, no-code solutions makes it an attractive option for anyone looking to set up a distinctive online presence. Just as physical spaces influence our experiences, Muse’s 3D virtual environments can redefine how we interact online.

Curious to see it for yourself? Check them out at [muse.place](https://www.muse.place) and experience the future of website building firsthand!
